messages.title: The local choice for Folkestone, Hythe and Romney Marsh
messages.content: It is an honour to be seeking your votes as a genuine local candidate standing for election in the area where I am from, where I live, where I work and where I went to school. I want a better Folkestone, Hythe and Romney Marsh. Use your vote for a better future by voting Labour on Thursday 7 May.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To abolish the unfair and cruel bedroom tax and to support a mass housing programme including council houses.
To support a living wage for all workers and to abolish exploitative zero hour contracts.
To be your local champion campaigning for the resolution of local issues on your behalf like dog fouling, litter, housing, parking and crime.
To ensure every school has an after school club and that we have the childcare provision we need and that we have a care package in place for everyone from cradle to grave.
To reverse the Tory/Lib Dem tax cut for millionaires and to cut income tax for ordinary working people making work pay and creating a stronger economy.

issues.economy: To support a living wage for all workers and to abolish exploitative zero hour contracts.
issues.education: To ensure every school has an after school club and that we have the childcare provision we need and that we have a care package in place for everyone from cradle to grave.

housing.content: To abolish the unfair and cruel bedroom tax and to support a mass housing programme including council houses.
